content: The full year revenue growth assumptions include double-digit revenue growth in the DTC channel comprised of higher price and the continued shift in product mix to higher-priced products, upper single-digit revenue growth in the real estate channel, driven primarily by price realization, and higher renewal customer accounts and a mid-20% decrease in real estate channel revenue due to a decline in our expectations for this channel related to the historically challenging sellers market an extremely low level of home inventory.
